item.description:
http://www.thenayp.com/events/event/march-networking-social

Mark your calendars for the March Networking Social at Mama Iguana's in Northampton. And please RSVP on Facebook so we know you're coming.


New to NAYP? Not sure where to start? Our connector for the night will be Kara Martin Snyder (at right). Keep an eye out for her if you'd like some help making connections!

Our featured business will be Provisions, one of the region's premier destination stores for fine wine, craft beer, and specialty cheese, charcuterie and grocery items.

Provisions has generously donated two free passes to the WGBY Wine Lovers Weekend, scheduled for March 15. These passes, worth $45 each, will be given away as door prizes at the Networking Social.

Our featured non-profit will be Homeward Vets, an organization that helps to provide home furnishings to previously homeless veterans transitioning into permanent housing.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Northampton Area "Young" Profesionals Networking Social
